__e: Listen, don't say anything to anybody about this, hear?
He had it when I found him.
You telling me... That you didn't find this in here?
~ And if you found the reason To live on and not to die ~
Isn't that how you found me last time?
You found me the place I live in now.
You walked in on me in bed with another man.
Hey, you found me in bed with another woman.
You found him on the street and that is your problem
Didn't you say you found it in the forest?
This is about the dead 5-year-old that you found in the woods.

You found it in you to do what needs to be done.

Well, looks like you found your man.

Because you found no one else? Or was he the best man for the job?
And that's when you know you will have found yourself.

Ever since you met him and realised he was just a man.
